path.style: fill: none; stroke: #080808; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: '#3E3E3E'; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

path.style: fill: none; stroke: #FED036; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
